item.title: A comparison between RISC-V implementations
item.author: claudio.dossantosjunior@yahoo.com.br (Junior Santos)
item.description: This article seeks to perform a comparison among the main implementations of RISC-V, which are the chips: Rocket, BOOM, Ariane (CVA6), and SHAKTI C-Class.
